items.title: Caponata pasta
items.description: Whip up our easy vegetarian caponata pasta in just 20 minutes. It's simple to make and packs three of your five-a-day into one delicious meal

image.alt: Caponata pasta in pan, garnished with basil and parmesan
image.title: Caponata pasta

items.title: Coconut & squash dhansak
items.description: This quick and easy vegetarian curry is perfect for a healthy weeknight dinner – with butternut squash, coconut milk, lentils and spinach

image.alt: Coconut & squash dhansak
image.title: Coconut & squash dhansak

items.title: Gnocchi cacio e pepe
items.description: Enjoy a comforting bowl of gnocchi with parmesan and black pepper. It's simple but utterly delicious – and the best part is, it only takes seven minutes to make

image.alt: Gnocchi cacio e pepe served in bowls
image.title: Gnocchi cacio e pepe

items.title: Vegetarian fajitas
items.description: Looking for a quick and easy veggie family meal? Try these meat-free fajitas, loaded with black beans, avocado and peppers, which take just 15 minutes to make

image.alt: A veggie fajita wrap being held in cupped hands
image.title: Vegetarian fajitas

items.title: Pineapple fried rice
items.description: Add chunks of fresh pineapple to fried rice to transform it into something special. Serve on its own for a family dinner, or as part of a Chinese banquet

image.alt: Pineapple fried rice served in a large dish
image.title: Pineapple fried rice

items.title: Gnocchi with mushrooms & blue cheese
items.description: Soft, creamy goat's cheese or a deliciously strong blue cheese both work well in this easy veggie supper that's on the table in just 20 minutes

image.alt: Gnocchi with mushrooms & blue cheese 2016
image.title: Gnocchi with mushrooms & blue cheese 2016

items.title: Indian chickpeas with poached eggs
items.description: This quick, fibre-rich veggie supper is filling and good for you too. Chickpeas are a great source of manganese, which is essential for healthy bone structure

image.alt: Indian chickpeas with poached eggs
image.title: Indian chickpeas with poached eggs

items.title: Vegan kale pesto pasta
items.description: Whizz up kale, pumpkin seeds, basil and garlic to make this easy kale pesto. It's perfect stirred through wholemeal spaghetti for a healthy vegan meal

image.alt: Vegan kale pesto pasta served on a plate
image.title: Vegan kale pesto pasta

items.title: Sweetcorn & courgette fritters
items.description: An easy, vegetarian fritter you can have on the table in 25 minutes. Top with an egg with a runny yolk and a drizzle of our chilli dressing

image.alt: Sweetcorn & courgette fritters
image.title: Sweetcorn & courgette fritters

items.title: Vegan fajitas
items.description: Make a vegan version of fajitas with all the flavours of the classic Mexican dish. It makes a great sharing dish where everyone can help themselves

image.alt: Vegan fajitas served on a plate
image.title: Vegan fajitas

items.title: Pea & leek open lasagne
items.description: Make this healthy pea and leek lasagne in just 25 minutes. It delivers three of your 5-a-day and costs less than £2 a serving – perfect for midweek suppers

image.alt: Pea & leek open lasagne served on a plate
image.title: Pea & leek open lasagne

items.title: Vegan ramen
items.description: Enjoy this vegan ramen for a tasty midweek meal in just 25 minutes. Dried mushrooms and miso paste give the broth plenty of umami flavour

image.alt: Two bowls of vegan ramen with chopsticks

items.title: Veggie vermicelli
items.description: Rustle up this veggie vermicelli with garlic and chilli dressing in just 15 minutes. It's perfect for busy days when you want something quick and healthy

items.title: Spiced halloumi & pineapple burger with zingy slaw
items.description: Pack four of your 5-a-day into these tasty veggie burgers with barbecued halloumi. Wrap in lettuce cups instead of buns for a healthy, low-calorie option

items.title: Veggie Chinese pancakes

items.description: Get your kids helping out in the kitchen with this child-friendly vegan Thai green curry. With tofu and lots of veggies, it's full of flavour

items.title: Avocado & black bean eggs
items.description: Set yourself up for the day with this healthy veggie breakfast with eggs, avocado and black beans. It takes just 10 minutes to throw together and makes a great lunch, too

items.title: Spiced carrot & lentil soup
items.description: A delicious, spicy blend packed full of iron and low in fat to boot. It's ready in under half an hour, or can be made in a slow cooker
